title: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX)
description: Bug 3970[preferences] UI needed to define the default line delimiters for new files (1GFIOAX) the Windows workstations are used as X terminals and to run Eclipse (since PC are cheaper than Unix boxes).
OB: When creating a new file on Windows workstations, the default line delimiters are not set to Unix line delimiters, which is the required format for the end product that is a Unix product.
EB: Even if a new file is created on Windows, it should have Unix line delimiters by default. A user interface (Preference) should be provided by the Workbench to define the line delimiter for new files. Possible values for the line delimiter should include Dos / Windows, Mac, Unix, and the default platform line delimiter. This UI should be used by all plugins to ensure consistent line delimiters for new files.
